refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifno -- the number of the table to be deleted

iwhen -- if zero the table is deleted at init time; otherwise the table number is registered for being deleted at note deactivation. If the table is deleted at init time it is possible that an earlier opcode that uses the table will fail or crash on a performance cycle. It is the user's responsibility to avoid this error.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the ftfree opcode. It uses the file ftfree.csd.
Example of the ftfree opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
instr 1: gitempTable = 101.000 B 0.000 .. 3.000 T 3.000 TT 3.000 M: 0.50000 0.50000 INIT ERROR in instr 1: Invalid ftable no. 101.000000 instr 1: gitempTable = 101.000 Error deleting ftable 101 B 3.000 - note deleted. i1 had 1 init errors B 3.000 .. 5.000 T 5.000 TT 5.000 M: 0.00000 0.00000
